page.title: 12Millfield School
page.content: Millfield School founded in 1935 by the first head Mr.Meyer.In 1970 Mr.Atkinson became head.The aim was to provide the best education in the world for the pupils.The number of pupils rose from a handful to 1238 today taught by 163 teachers.There are three sports halls,badminton,squash and tennis courts,fully equipped athletic track,a covered heated swimming pool and many other sport pitches.The stables have about 50 horses.The school is extremely proud of their sporting achiements.Many international sport players were coached there.A room has been consecrated as a place of worship for all faiths.Art,craft and music attain a high standard.In 1984 71% passed 'O' level in 55 different subjects.At 'A' level 75%_85% passed in 38 subjects. Village of Education in summer vac.
